name: Galactic Quest
description:
This is a first person shooter game taking place on a different planet where the goal is to collect a jewel embedded in stone that will give them infinite lives. They have to go through this maze where they will have to fight against various alien robots from that universe who are protecting the jewel. Throughout the maze they will find health for themselves and bullets for their gun to keep them going in the game.

Controls - 

WASD to move front, back, left and right,
Shift + WASD to run,
Mouse to navigate the direction,
Mouse left click for shooting
Escape to Pause.
